preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 35.0 g of Bismuth Oxide (Bi2O3) using an analytical balance. 
 2. Weigh out 10.0 g of Scandium Oxide (Sc2O3). 
 3. Weigh out 15.0 g of Terbium Oxide (Tb2O3). 
 4. Combine all powders in a clean, dry mixing bowl. 
 5. Use a mortar and pestle to thoroughly mix the powders for at least 10 minutes to ensure homogeneity.
